prompts.name: live-burp-security-audit
prompts.description: Live security audit using BurpSuite Professional
prompts.template:
I need to perform a live security audit on {{target_url}} using BurpSuite Professional. Please help me:

1. **Verify Live Integration**
   - Check BurpSuite connection status
   - Confirm all tools are available
   - Verify proxy configuration

2. **Live Traffic Analysis**
   - Analyze real proxy traffic
   - Review live site map data
   - Monitor ongoing requests

3. **Live Vulnerability Scanning**
   - Start live security scans
   - Monitor scan progress in real-time
   - Review findings as they are discovered

4. **Interactive Testing**
   - Send requests to Repeater for manual testing
   - Configure Intruder attacks with live payloads
   - Use live encoding/decoding tools

5. **Real-time Reporting**
   - Generate reports from live scan data
   - Export findings from BurpSuite
   - Document live exploitation attempts

This audit will use live BurpSuite Professional data and functionality.
